prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Piano, Synth Lead, Drums, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Guitar, Piano, Synth Lead, and Drums, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Piano, Synth Lead, and Drums, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
Guitar, Piano, Synth Lead, and Drums are all present in this song, but Bass is absent.
